forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. High 11C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High 51F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 2C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 36F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 36F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning then becoming cloudy with periods of rain later in the day. High 58F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain early tapering to showers and becoming mixed with snow late. Low 2C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain early tapering to showers and becoming mixed with snow late. Low near 35F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 100%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning turning to light rain in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning. The rain and snow will become lighter and change to all rain in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 1C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 34F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 16C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 61F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 38F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High around 70F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 19C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 66F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 38F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 72F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.
